
## backsolve function test
```{r  ABC}
A = matrix( c(2, 4, 3, 1, 5, 7), nrow=2, ncol=3, byrow = TRUE) 


C = matrix( c(2, 4, 3, 1, 5, 7, 3, 5, 8, 10, 11, 8), nrow=3, ncol=4) 

B = matrix( c(29, 43, 50, 88, 43, 75, 84, 121), nrow=2, ncol=4, byrow=T) 

gpuA <- vclMatrix(A, type="double")
gpuB <- vclMatrix(B, type="double")
C
```

## test

```{r backsolve}
NlocalCache = 1000
Nglobal = c(8L, 8L, 8L)
Nlocal = c(4L, 2L)
C<-gpuRandom::backsolveBatch(gpuA, gpuB, diagIsOne=FALSE, Nglobal, Nlocal, NlocalCache)
as.matrix(C)

```
